title: Tahm Kench price reduction
body: It's been a week and Tahm Kench is still 7800 IP??

replies.body: Thank you for reporting this. I am going to reduce the price to 6300 IP right now. You should see the new price in a few minutes.
Yea. If you guyizezs can price reduce the Tahm....well that would be a hoot.
